text: Hao Ying (; born 1958) is a professor of electrical and computer engineering at Wayne State University in Detroit, Michigan. He was named a Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2012 for his contributions to the theory and biomedical applications of fuzzy control. == Works == * == References == Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:American biomedical engineers Category:Donghua University alumni Category:University of Alabama at Birmingham alumni Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Wayne State University faculty
title: Hao Ying
